checkbox.name: Window Track
checkbox.desc: If checked, displays the song name, its number, and composer in the window title.

checkbox.name: Track Credits
checkbox.desc: If checked, displays the song name, the composer, and the charter in a neat box.

checkbox.name: Menu Crewmates
checkbox.desc: If checked, Crewmates will appear in the Main Menu and die at a certain point of the menu theme.

checkbox.name: Camera Shift
checkbox.desc: If checked, the camera will move based on the notes the focused character hits. (WARNING: This will cause certain songs to look weird, enable if you dare!)
